summary: Empty searchAttributes array passed to child workflow options causes a protobuf parsing panic in the Go SDK with error 'expected { character for map value'. The PHP SDK fails to properly serialize empty search attributes when creating child workflows.
userImpact: Users cannot create child workflows with empty search attributes, causing workflow execution to panic and fail.
rootCause: The protobuf codec incorrectly serializes an empty searchAttributes array, producing invalid protobuf syntax that the Go SDK cannot parse when decoding.
workaround: Avoid passing empty searchAttributes arrays; either omit the parameter or provide non-empty search attributes.
resolutionDetails: Issue was resolved by fixing the protobuf serialization of empty search attributes in the PHP SDK.
keyQuote: proto_codec_parse_message: expected { character for map value
